testcase.classname: As a user of CtheSigns I want to be able to login to the application and carryout assessments for my patients
testcase.system-out: Given I am on CtheSigns Login page..........................................passed When I enter my email into the Email field..................................passed And I enter I enter my password into the password field.....................passed And I click on the Login button.............................................passed Then I should be signed into the application successfully...................passed
